TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_trv_Phuma_egu_bunga, title = Phuma_egu_bunga, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Seediq]}, url = {https://trv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Phuma_egu_bunga} }

S.FORM: = Phuma egu bunga = Hani miyan msterung ciida,kingal ali,nikan kingal rudan alang miyan meyah qmita qbsuran mu rseno, klaun na hani nami msterung, mhulis qmita yami ma smiling,"Knuwan namu phuma bunga di Walis?〞 Maanu mesa ku lmngelung"ini ku phuma bunga wa!"mesa ku,"Knuwan namu tuting laqi sa rudan nii,salu mntena bunga nii egu laqi namu si"! Mesa qbsuran mu.

= Phoma ego bonga = Hani miyan msterong ciida,kingal ali,nikan kingal rodan alang miyan meyah qmita qbsoran mo rseno, klaon na hani nami msterong, mholis qmita yami ma smiling,"Knowan namo phoma bonga di Walis?〞 Maano mesa ko lmngelong"ini ko phoma bonga wa!"mesa ko,"Knowan namo toting laqi sa rodan nii,salo mntena bonga nii ego laqi namo si"! Mesa qbsoran mo.
